author: The Film Theorists
description:
*Thanks to BAMBU Labs for sponsoring this video!*
Check out their premiere desktop 3D Printers to create your own LEGOs and anything your heart desires! ► https://dada.link/7fGrIn.

If the LEGO Movie were made from real LEGO pieces…how much would that cost to make? If we made every character, building, mountain, and cloud in real life, what would the price be? Let me tell you, the answer is NOT what you think…
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

title: Film Theory: How EXPENSIVE Are The LEGOs In The LEGO Movie?
